name: Weng Santos
text: Yes from military service.  Some will say he is the commander in chief, so military sya.  But, the constitution states that "civilian authority, is, at all times, supreme over the military."    Thus, that makes FM a civilian at the time of his removal.

source_obj.text: Yes from military service.  Some will say he is the commander in chief, so military sya.  But, the constitution states that "civilian authority, is, at all times, supreme over the military."    Thus, that makes FM a civilian at the time of his removal.
